body: Planning      Documents Open for Public Review  Loading ...  There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.       Completed Plans    We have just finalized our State of the Park report. This purpose of this report is to: 1) provide visitors and the American public a snapshot of the status and trend in the condition of a park’s priority resources and values 2) summarize and communicate complex scientific, scholarly, and park operations factual information and expert opinion using non-technical language and 3) highlight park stewardship activities and accomplishments to maintain or improve the State of the Park.            Foundation Document 2014 (PDF)            Monument Management Plan and Record of Decision (PDF)             Travel Management Plan           Invasive Plant Management Plan           Long Range Interpretive Plan (PDF)           Museum Management Plan (PDF)   Scope of Collections Statement (PDF)          Little brown bat with white nose syndrome Al Hicks  White Nose Syndrome Response Plan 2012
title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Planning
